31102.zh-TW:
* 修正課表提醒星期設定錯誤(需重新點選才能正常)
  * 修正請假系統顯示錯誤
31102.en-US:
* Fixed an issue where the week setting for class schedule reminders was incorrect (requiring a re-click to function properly).
* Fixed a display error in the leave request system.

31101.zh-TW:
* 新增在學證明查詢
* 新增校方問題回報
* 修正部分介面高度錯誤
* 支援自動登入可手動切換離線登入
31101.en-US:
* Provide a new feature to check enrollment status.
* Offer a new way to report issues to the school.
* Corrected UI height discrepancies.
* Support automatic login with a manual switch to offline login.
